summary: The Portable Ultrasound Reimbursement Equity Act of 2025 aims to amend the Social Security Act to provide Medicare coverage for portable ultrasound transportation and setup services. It modifies existing regulations regarding diagnostic X-ray services to include ultrasound, ensuring equitable payment for portable ultrasound services, mirroring the existing system for portable X-rays.  The changes are slated to take effect January 1, 2027.
